title: When You Q an Ulting Rek'sai as Warwick

replies.body: Hopping on a popular kid's back, it will lead to your doom.
How your comment confuses me so, philosopher.
Rek ults to base, u r ded
True
Pretty sure you cant

It works, but it requires careful timing and Rek'Sai needs to have an active spell shield to block the damage so that it doesn't get interrupted.
It also follows things like Nocturne ult or TF ult, as well as summoner spell teleport.

i just thought of how broken it is today tbh.... low elo probs lol.

have a good one.

It's broken only in certain circumstances, and a lot of champions are like that anyway.
I can see Warwick top being picked against Shen for the free teleport into a teamfight.
Had a game where enemy Thresh kept trying to CC me, but Jaws said no.
That poor dog.
Warwick is probably in just as bad of situation if he Qs an ulting Rek'sai, so at least it's accurate
I was talking about the gif dog. ;v;
Yes I know
lol what, sorry I wrote that right when i Woke up from a nap xD
I'm not usually this guy, but please don't be this irresponsible with your dog if given the opportunity ._.

if it means letting my dog bite rain or stick his head out the window then I'll allow it but open air like that fk no. That's dangerous and i'd freak out if I did that to my dog, but I can't pick him up so meh.
ten bucks says it was a green screen.
I wonder what happens when tf ults >:D
It also works if you Q some one right as {{champion:429}} ults them. You hover around in the air next to her until they come out of the ult.
I once followed a gp from mid to top while using q due to his tp
